text: Scirpophaga goliath is a moth in the family Crambidae. It was described by Hubert Marion and Pierre Viette in 1953. It is found on Madagascar. The wingspan is 46–52 mm. The forewings are fuscous, but the costal area pale ochreous white. The hindwings are white. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1953 Category:Schoenobiinae Category:Moths of Madagascar
title: Scirpophaga goliath
